sentence.Network_en: He sat behind a desk laboriously writing with an Army issue pen.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坐在书桌后吃力地写着，用的是一支部队发的钢笔。

sentence.Network_en: McGinnis pushed himself laboriously out of the chair and waddled to the window.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦金尼斯吃力地从椅子上站起来，摇摇晃晃地走到了窗前。

PerfectNetExp.abs: A - 豆丁网 ... L labor 分娩生产 laboriously 艰难地 lactate 乳酸盐.
The tank laboriously crawled on with a huddle of soldiers hanging behind ., 坦克吃力地爬行着 , 一堆士兵缩在后面跟着走.
1. labor-savinglaboriously ad. 艰难地，辛勤地-
gasoline n. 汽油laboriously adv. 费力地，艰难地labor movement 词组劳工运动.

list.abs: laborious的翻译中文意思... ... a laborious style 不流畅的文体 laborious bees 勤劳的蜜蜂 laborious style 不流畅的文体.
Panel painting involved a painstaking , laborious process ., 镶板绘画是个费心费力的过程.
a road from Ledo to China was also an immense , laborious task .从利多建筑一条通往中国的公路，也是一个巨大而艰苦的任务。
辛苦的... ... 2. to plod through your work 辛苦地工作 3. hard work;laborious work 辛苦的工作 4. You were hard. 你辛苦了。.

entry.tran: 耗时费力的；辛苦的；艰难的
entry.def: If you describe a task or job as laborious, you mean that it takes a lot of time and effort.

example.ex: Keeping the garden tidy all year round can be a laborious task.
example.tran: 一年到头把花园拾掇得干净整洁也不是件轻松活儿。

sentences.sentence: "their lives were spent in committee making decisions for others to execute on the basis of data laboriously gathered for them"

auth_sentence.content: Rath fumbles laboriously with his cigarettes on the floor.

auth_sentence.content: If a button fell off, you would laboriously sew it back on.

sentences.cn: 费劲地抄出一份旧的手稿
